activities.loc: Branch 5 Courthouse and Law Enforcement Center

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jaxeryus T Lezine

records.addlTxt: $5000 cash bond posted - signed by def ($4,010 posted in COC, $990 posted in the jail)
Bail/bond hearing on November 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

from Jeff, JSS    re: Def informed JSS that he will have to move out of current residence this weekend & if approevd, would like to live w/ his mother in Volvo, IL.  Def is on GPS monitoring for exclusion zone, however, JSS policy states that GPS units are not supposed to go beyond adjacent counties to LAX Co.  Could def's GPS condition be modified to allow the removal of GPS unit prior to him leaving town this weekend?
Per RAG:  Modify bond to:  No Contact w/ La Crosse Co. and Monroe Co. without prior approval by JSS.  No GPS while def resides in IL w/ his mother.
CRT:  def should sign a new bond when he is here to remove GPS
Calendar Call held 10-24-2022 w/ RAG - filed by Amy Frydenlund

Def appears in person 
PD's Office is looking for an Atty for the Def 
Def comments 
CRT:  Atty Randtke will be appointed to represent him regarding what Def is raising at County expense.  The PD's Office will continue to look for an Atty.
CALL: 12-28-22 at 10:45 with RAG
Calendar call on December 28, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Def is eligible for SPD.  967 contacts made

State by Kranz by zoom /  Def NA
Def does not qualify for Pub Def - he does not appear
CRT:  Warrant issued for $1000 cash - forfeit cash bond already posted
--RECALLED--Def now appears by zoom /  State by Kranz
CRT:  def doesn't qualify on 22CF741 but is repersented on 22CF502.  Mr Lezine, have you spolen w/ Pub Def office?
Def:  I have not spoken w/ anyone since before June.  Asks about a County Apptd atty
CRT:  you would have to complete the "green sheet" & you will have to get the letter from Pub Def office confirming you don't qualify for their services
Quash Warrant - CRT finds Good Cause to go beyond time limits

Same bond to continue

from JSS   re:req for clarification of def's request to remove GPS for weekend trip - multiple Judges have given different answers to this request
Per GLD:  Judge Levine has ruled - the GPS shall NOT be removed without approval of the victim

State by Kranz in person /  Def in person
Pub Def office is looking for Atty for def
CRT finds good cause to go beyond time limits
Def:  would like the GPS be removed from 9-3 for a trip to WI Dells
CRT:  I will give you permission to go to WI Dells.  Without input from the victim I can't rule on GPD - leave the GPS on for now
